about_the_game:
Create a cute and cozy home in the countryside with the Country Cottage tileset for RPG Maker and more! Includes the plants (and pre-assembled landscaping) to make an easy cottage garden of your very own!

The Country Cottage tileset includes:

Water, grass, dirt, tall grass, vines and other ground details
Two types of wood floor
Concrete floor
Rugs in brown and blue colors
Autotile fence
Rock paths

Walls:

Wicker wall pattern
Two walls with tudor-style wood details
Thatch roof (with shadow-side version for the backs of roofs)

Also included:

Shelves and cabinets (can be mixed and matched to make various furniture pieces)
Shelf contents – books, china plates, knickknacks and other details
Fireplaces with heavy wood mantle – one version decorated, one plain
Fancy lamps
Cute beds with flower pillows – one with a wood frame, one with a metal frame. The wood version has an optional canopy.
Chaise lounge (and matching chair)
Plush couch
Windows and curtains
Framed art
Flower garlands
Chandeliers (two sizes) and matching sconce/small lamp
Bathroom tiles
Farmhouse sink (with no water, water, and soapy variations)
Two styles of tables, round and square, with dining chairs
Wood/wicker furniture – hutches, small cabinets, etc. Includes empty and decorated variations.
Old-fashioned stove
Food and cooking-related tiles
Cottage garden plants, individual and pre-built garden sections – wide variety with lots of colors.
Roof tiles with roof peak detail
Potted plants
Garden knickknacks – small statues, gazing balls, mushrooms and other details
Potting bench
5 Trees in various sizes


Events and Animations

Door (lit and unlit)
Fire animation

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
